name: image

children.name: bird
Ostriches have the largest eyes of any land animal
Most hummingbirds weigh less than a nickel.
animal
A snail can sleep for three years
Slugs have four noses
A rhinoceros' horn is made of hair
mammal
The human brain is over three times as big as the brain of other mammals that are of similar body size.
All mammals have hair, even dolphins and whales that live in the ocean
Koalas sleep the longest of any animal. They sleep 22 hours a day
Bats are the only mammals that can fly.
cat
Cats knead with their paws when they are happy.
A cat can jump approximately seven times its height
standing
Standing the majority of the day has been said to increase concentration
Standing for most of the day has the potential to burn 30,000 more calories in a year
dog
If your dog’s acting funny, get out the umbrella! Stormy weather is on the way
Watch that plate of cookies! A Dog’s sense of smell is 10,000 – 100,000 times stronger
Dalmatian puppies are pure white when they are born and develop their spots as they grow older
The twitching and paw movements that occur during their sleep are signs that your dog is dreaming
water
There is the same amount of water on Earth as there was when the Earth was formed
Somewhere between 70 and 75 percent of the earth's surface is covered with water.
An ice cube takes up about 9% more volume than the water used to make it.
Unlike many substances, water expands as it freezes
